Title: Boom
Plot: A bomb explodes in an office building, and the chief suspect is a security guard. Nick helps his prostitute friend again but, after giving in to his passion, she is found dead the next morning.
Writer: Josh Berman, Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn
GuestStars: Steven Lee, Krista Allen, Mark Valley, Gregory Itzin, Tim Redwine, J. D. Evermore, Jeff Brockton, Kristin K. Ulrich, Greg Collins, Jonathan Bray, Stephen Lee
